Title: Relates to licensure requirements for fiscal intermediaries; repealer
Summary: Relates to licensure requirements for fiscal intermediaries under the consumer directed personal assistance program.
LawCode: Amd §365-f, rpld §365-f sub 4-a ¶¶(b) & (c), ¶(a) sub¶¶ (ii-b) & (ii-c), Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to fiscal intermediaries under the consumer directed personal assistance program; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
